Text:
Wow, a fast download and great quality and audio. Thank you very much!! 
I've searched a long time for this movie with good quality and finally, I found it! Yes!

Decent quality video... but, the sound is distorted in loud sections, especially when there is low bass.  Was the level boosted from that of the original DVD?  If this is what the original sounds like then it is very poor by 2010 standards.
awesome download but theres no audio...?
